entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 6:35 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:35 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
